text: Åke Bertil Lundqvist (9 June 1936 – 4 August 2021) was a Swedish actor. He was born in Gävle Parish, Sweden. He was known for his roles in Häxan Surtant and in Beck – Mannen med ikonerna. He also played bookkeeper Schröder in the Gösta Berlings movie series. His career began in 1973. Lundqvist died on 4 August 2021 in Högalid, Sweden at the age of 85.Skådespelaren Åke Lundqvist död ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish voice actors
title: Åke Lundqvist
